transArray.content: The hotel is very clean and quiet. The service attitude is very good. I am very satisfied.

Dear guest, thank you for your recognition of Hanting Hotel! The hotel creates a "home" culture, treats every guest like family, is warm and hospitable, and makes every traveler feel the warmth of home; the hotel has also added Delivery robots, self-service laundry rooms, dryers, tea areas, and free reading areas provide value-for-money convenience for your travels. We look forward to your visit again!
